name: Lissandra
subtitle: the Ice Witch
description: Lissandra's magic twists the pure power of ice into something dark and terrible. With the force of her black ice, she does more than freeze—she impales and crushes those who oppose her. To the terrified denizens of the north, she is known only as ''The... See More

abilities.name: Iceborn Subjugation
abilities.description: When an enemy champion dies near Lissandra they become a Frozen Thrall. Frozen Thralls slow nearby enemies and then, after a delay, shatter from the intense cold, dealing magic damage to nearby targets.

abilities.name: Ice Shard
abilities.description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Move Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

abilities.name: Ring of Frost
abilities.description: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.

abilities.name: Glacial Path
abilities.description: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.
